recipes.title: Chicken Satay
ingredients: cubed, skinless, and boneless chicken breast
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, tomato sauce, peanut oil, garlic, black pepper and cumin. Marinate chicken in sauce for 15 minutes.
Preheat the grill at high heat
Heat cooking oil in saucepan in medium heat, and saute onion and garlic. Mix in water, peanut butter, soy sauce, and sugar. Cook until blended evenly
Lightly oil the grill grate. Thread chicken onto skewers, discard excess marinate, and grill skewers for 5 minutes at each side
Serve chicken skewers with the peanut sauce

recipes.title: Beef Japchae
instructions: Boil glass noodles for 7 minutes or according to the package
Slice all vegetables: sweet onions, shiitake mushrooms, and paprika
In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sugar, oyster sauce and sesame oil. Set aside
Heat cooking oil in saucepan in medium heat, and saute sweet onions and minced garlic. When softened, add in the other sliced vegetables and shaved beef
When beef is almost done cooking, add in the baby spinach. Place lid on pan and allow it to steam until wilted
Pour in the mixed sauce and stir evenly
Garnish with sesame seeds and ready to serve

recipes.title: Beef Udon Noodle Soup
instructions: Boil udon noodles for 11 minutes or according to the package. Rinse with cold water and set aside
Boil two eggs for 7 minutes and set aside in cold water
To make the broth, in a medium sauce pan, add water and 1 dashi packet. Bring to boil
Allow to simmer for 3 minutes and discard the dashi packet. Then add soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and salt. Mix evenly and set aside
Heat cooking oil on frying pan on medium heat. Cook sweet onions, green onions, and minced garlic for 3 minutes
Add the meat and stir fry. Season with sugar and soy sauce. When done cooking, set aside
Divide udon noodles into 2 separate serving bowls. Pour in the hot broth, place the stir fried beef and soft boiled egg on top
Garnish with green onions and ready to serve

recipes.title: Orecchiette Pasta
instructions: Heat cooking oil in a large, deep skillet over medium heat. Add onion and a pinch of salt. Cook for 5 minutes
Remove casing from the italian sausages and add it in the skillet. Cook until browned (about 5 minutes)
Pour chicken broth into the mixture. Bring to boil before adding the orecchiette pasta. Cook until pasta is cooked through (about 20 minutes)
Add in arugula and stir until wilted
Sprinkle Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese on top and ready to serve

recipes.title: Burger
instructions: Melt butter on a pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until caramelized. Set aside
On the same pan, cook beef patty. Season with black pepper and salt. Cook each side for 5 minutes
Place cheese on top of the cooked beef patty and allow it to melt
Place the patty with melted cheese on top of the burger bun. Stack with lettuce, caramelized onions, sliced tomatoes and pickles
Season with mustard and ketchup
Top with another bun and ready to serve (repeat for the other burger)

recipes.title: Oyakodon
instructions: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, dashi, mirin and sugar. Bring to a simmer for 1 minute
Add chicken cubes in a single layer. Cook until tender and no longer pink for about 5 minutes on each side
Add beaten egg on top
Garnish with green onion and ready to serve
